articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: Denmark Queen Margrethe II announces surprise abdication. Who will succeed her? - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Queen Margrethe II reigned for 52 years and has been Europe's only reigning queen after the death of Britain's Elizabeth II. | World News
articles.content: Denmark's Queen Margrethe II, who is Europe's longest-serving monarch, on Sunday said she would abdicate the throne on January 14 and that will she be succeeded by her eldest son Crown Prince Frederi… [+3231 chars]
